query:
ALTER TABLE campaigns 
ADD COLUMN phase1Result ENUM('success', 'failure', 'pending') DEFAULT 'pending' AFTER currentNarrativeObjective,
ADD COLUMN phase2Result ENUM('success', 'failure', 'pending') DEFAULT 'pending' AFTER phase1Result,
ADD COLUMN phase3Result ENUM('success', 'failure', 'pending') DEFAULT 'pending' AFTER phase2Result,
ADD COLUMN phase4Result ENUM('success', 'failure', 'pending') DEFAULT 'pending' AFTER phase3Result;
